c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (00:21): running this small example http://pastebin.com/58SQ9xCf in my browser is causing is giving me this error in the console. `Security error" code: "1000` related to the frameBuffer. Any ideas?

4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (00:24): nice that he did the web audio api for gwet
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:25): It needs to be written in JavaScript, not compiled to it, otherwise me no likey. xD
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:26): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049: They might as well take vNES and compile the java to javascript

c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (00:29): why am I getting a security error when I try to access the frameBuffer? From googling around it seems to be related to having the resource in the same directory which I do.

6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:31): "Cause you need to be able to chat with other people on facebook while you pokemon"
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:33): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049: I wonder why everyone is avoiding XAudioJS
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:34): Because I'm seeing a lot of people have things only for moz audio or for web audio only
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:34): rather than use XAudioJS to have both AND a flash fallback AND a wav pcm fallback if flash even fails
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:36): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049: Also V8 really needs to fix setInterval
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:36): That "add one ms to the delay" bug f**ks up a lot
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:36): you put 16 ms, chrome thinks 17 ms
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:37): while firefox on mac keeps it at 16
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:44): do time diff / number of iterations
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (00:47): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049: I swear the js gba emulator runs as fast as jsnes and gwt-nes
